meanings.definition: To make (bacteria) more susceptible to phagocytosis by white blood cells.
meanings.sent1: Adding special markers to the bacteria can help in opsonifying them for the white blood cells.
meanings.sent2: The immune system uses opsonifying to tag bacteria for removal by white blood cells.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, not realizing they were about to be opsonified by the immune system.
meanings.sent4: The opsonifying process acts like a spotlight, highlighting the bacteria for the white blood cells.
meanings.sent5: Imagine opsonifying as putting a target on the bacteria for the immune system to find easily.

meanings.definition: The process of enhancing phagocytosis by white blood cells.
meanings.sent1: Opsonifying is crucial for the immune system to efficiently clear out harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the mechanisms behind opsonifying to improve immune responses.
meanings.sent3: The annual opsonifying competition among cells always brings a lot of excitement.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against infections, opsonifying is like giving the immune system a power boost.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of opsonifying lies in its ability to aid white blood cells in their protective duties.
